text: Károly Fatér (9 April 1940 - 19 September 2020) was a Hungarian footballer. He was born in Veszprém County. He competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City, where he won a gold medal with the Hungarian team. Fatér died on 19 September 2020 in Budapest, aged 80. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Hungary Category:Sportspeople from Budapest Category:Veszprém County
title: Károly Fatér
